19-1206.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Federal Legislation Committee meeting held Tuesday, March 12, 2019.A motion was made by Vice Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Richardson and Mungo2.

19-1207.summary: Recommendation to receive and file Dentons' and staff's recommended updates and recommend additional updates to the 2020 Federal Legislative Agenda.Page 1 of 2411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:00 PMTUESDAY, DECEMBER 3, 2019CITY OF LONG BEACHFEDERAL LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESJulia Katz, Government Affairs Analyst, spoke; and presented the staff report.Vice Chair Mungo spoke.Councilmember Richardson spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Mungo and Councilmember Richardson.A motion was made by Member Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Mungo, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Richardson and Mungo3.
